params.name: text_a
params.description: string. The untokenized text of the first sequence. For singlesequence tasks, only this sequence must be specified.

params.name: text_b
params.description: (Optional) string. The untokenized text of the second sequence.Only must be specified for sequence pair tasks.

params.name: label
params.description: (Optional) string. The label of the example. This should bespecified for train and dev examples, but not for test examples.
